thread.title: Samantha Cameron reveals her style secrets - and why she shops for David
thread.title_full: Samantha Cameron reveals her style secrets - and why she shops for David

author: Lisa Armstrong
title: Samantha Cameron reveals her style secrets - and why she shops for David
text:
Samantha Cameron reveals her style secrets - and why she shops for David Samantha Cameron wearing Cefinn Lisa Armstrong , Fashion Director, The Daily Telegraph 22 February 2017 • 9:40am 
S amantha Cameron’s first collection for Cefinn (the name incorporates the initials of her four children, with an extra “n”, because Cefin was already taken) is a distillation of her personal style: well-cut separates and elegant dresses, in a tight colour palette of black, navy, red and khaki. The 35 styles are designed to work together, and 70 per cent are washable. 
When I visited her at home in North Kensington (expensive dark, wide floorboards, minimalist kitchen and chic black gridded glass doors on to the garden, which she designed herself), her two youngest children, Florence and Elwen, just back from school, seemed unperturbed by the extensive rails of clothes in the house. It was four days before Cefinn’s launch and Cameron herself was apprehensive but calm – she’s been thinking about this for a long time. 
R ed dress, £290, Cefinn; Khaki coat, £450, Cefinn
